movie.title: Clementine
movie.description_intro: Reeling from a one-sided breakup, heartbroken Karen breaks into her ex's lake house. There, she strikes up a complicated relationship with provocative younger woman Lana.
movie.description_full: Reeling from a one-sided breakup, heartbroken Karen breaks into her ex's lake house. There, she strikes up a complicated relationship with provocative younger woman Lana.

movies.title: The Judge
movies.summary: Hank Palmer is a successful defense attorney in Chicago, who is getting a divorce. When His brother calls with the news that their mother has died, Hank returns to his childhood home to attend the funeral. Despite the brittle bond between Hank and the Judge, Hank must come to his father's aid and defend him in court. Here, Hank discovers the truth behind the case, which binds together the dysfunctional family and reveals the struggles and secrecy of the family.

movies.title: The Karate Kid Part II
movies.summary: Picks up where the first movie (Karate Kid) leaves off. Mr. Miyagi and Daniel take a trip to Okinawa to visit Mr Miyagi's dying father. After arriving Mr Miyagi finds he still has feelings for an old love. This stirs up trouble with an old rival that he originally left Okinawa to avoid. In the mean time Daniel encounters a new love and also makes some enemies.

movies.title: Illuminated Texts
movies.summary: A montage provides a meditation on opposing extremes and the inevitability of destruction.
movies.description_full: A montage provides a meditation on opposing extremes and the inevitability of destruction.
movies.synopsis: A montage provides a meditation on opposing extremes and the inevitability of destruction.

movies.title: Elephant
movies.summary: A depiction of a series of violent killings in Northern Ireland with no clue as to exactly who is responsible.
movies.description_full: A depiction of a series of violent killings in Northern Ireland with no clue as to exactly who is responsible.
